publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3316# Mr Lloyd Quinan: MMR and Autism Research-That the Parliament notes the recent announcement by Her Majesty's Government of a Â£300,000 funding package to carry out a study into a possible link between the MMR vaccine and autism; acknowledges the genuine reservations parents have regarding sanctioning the use of the MMR vaccine and invites the Scottish Executive to consider initiating a similar research study.
S1M-3316# MMR and Autism Research (lodged on 21 August 2002) Alex Neil*, Brian Adam*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-3316# MMR and Autism Research (lodged on 21 August 2002) Elaine Smith*, Ms Margo MacDonald*
S1M-3316# MMR and Autism Research (lodged on 21 August 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3316# MMR and Autism Research (lodged on 21 August 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3316# MMR and Autism Research (lodged on 21 August 2002) Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-3316# MMR and Autism Research (lodged on 21 August 2002) Robin Harper*
